user_stories.title: As a user, I want to project setup and environment configuration
user_stories.description: Initialize the project repository, set up development, staging, and production environments, and configure CI/CD pipelines.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Project Setup and Environment Configuration
Then Initialize the project repository, set up development, staging, and production environments, and configure CI/CD pipelines.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to project initialization
user_stories.description: Create a new project repository, configure build tools, and set up a basic development environment.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Project Initialization
Then Create a new project repository, configure build tools, and set up a basic development environment.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to crm data source connection
user_stories.description: Establish a secure and reliable connection to the existing CRM database or API, ensuring necessary authentication and authorization.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs CRM Data Source Connection
Then Establish a secure and reliable connection to the existing CRM database or API, ensuring necessary authentication and authorization.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to data schema design and etl pipeline (initial)
user_stories.description: Design the initial data model for the dashboard, extracting relevant CRM data, transforming it for reporting, and loading it into a dashboard-optimized database.
user_stories.feature_name: Data Schema Design and ETL Pipeline (Initial)
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Data Schema Design and ETL Pipeline (Initial)
Then Design the initial data model for the dashboard, extracting relevant CRM data, transforming it for reporting, and loading it into a dashboard-optimized database.
